name: Citronix
desc: Citronix is a farm management system, developed using Spring Boot, designed to optimize lemon production, harvest, and sales.

name: YouQuiz
desc: YouQuiz is a Spring Boot app for managing quizzes and exams.

name: WaitingRoom
desc: WRM is a REST API for managing waiting rooms and organizing visitor flows in offices, services, or businesses.

name: E-Banking
desc: E-Banking is a REST API with Spring Security, offering role-based access and user management.

name: ITLens
desc: ITLens is a REST API for managing IT surveys, enabling survey creation, response collection, and real-time analysis.

name: Bati-Cuisine
desc: Bati-Cuisine is a Java app for estimating construction and renovation costs.
